H0.text: who is the premier of northern cape 2018. Zamani Saul

H1.text: who is the premier of northern cape 2018. John Block

H2.text: who is the premier of northern cape 2018. Manne Dipico

H3.text: who is the premier of northern cape 2018. Sylvia Lucas

A4.text: Saul assumed the office on 22 May 2019

A5.text: John Block resigned from the position in October 2015

A6.text: Sylvia Lucas was re-elected to her first full term as premier in 2014

A7.text: Zamani Saul has held the position since 2019
